html:
6.10.17  1:27 pm   What do you think about time and space?

     it's great, you can be somewhere. and then, somewhere else!

6.10.17  1:11 pm   I get that you don't really like the notion of choosing favorites. You like "unique qualities" of different things and trying new things. I can dig it. But, I mean, c'mon... you have to have a favorite SOMETHING or other, right? Favorite ice cream flavor? Favorite teenage mutant ninja turtle? Favorite material of pillow stuffing? Favorite anything? Throw us a bone here.

     my favorite american city is new york

6.10.17  1:06 pm   Hi, I just saw one of your videos and I was wondering what is mice?

     they are like lice. but a little bigger

6.10.17  12:46 pm   what picture are you going to use for your spotify image?

     i was thinking of using an umbrella

6.10.17  11:54 am   why do i feel like i'm crazy?

     because the entire world is crazy

6.10.17  11:50 am   so if a 5 second vine took a whole day and hotewig was split up into 5 second chunks it'd be 233 days to complete it. does that sound about right?

     you forgot the part where i had to learn the entire history of the world. and also the part where i had to solve the puzzle of trying to fit the entire story into 20 minutes and have it still make sense, and be fun to watch, while remaining reasonably accurate and also have the least amount of people mad at me for leaving their favorite thing out. and teach myself how to do 3d graphics. but other than that it sounds about right

6.10.17  11:15 am   How do you play on theremin?

     i'm not sure. i think you have to use your mind

6.10.17  11:05 am   what are your views on the origins and utility of religious belief systems?

     seems legit

6.10.17  10:08 am   Does it frustrate you that after all the work you did and all the sacrifices you made to put up your history of the world video, people are still asking for more? Does inspire you?

     a little of both

6.10.17  4:15 am   why are you such a confusing person

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

6.10.17  2:42 am   When did you write I love you?

     originally 2009, but in 2012 the ending of the chorus was re-written, the outtro limerick was added, and the verse was shortened. i also changed all the verse lyrics last week

6.10.17  2:27 am   how did you get out of your rut that presumably lasted 4 years?

     i realized that if there really is infinite creative potential, then you can literally just start with anything, such as rabbit snakes

6.10.17  2:18 am   why the IVm on i love you (on the "its true") sounds so nice? can you please give me some input about it? usually IVm sounds a bit corny or out of place but i think that that voicing/instrumentation worked really well. any thoughts on it?

     it's not quite a 4m, check where the bass is. but it is in the same family. really what we're talking about is the special note, and there are many ways to use it. such as 4minor, 5dom7b9, 3dom7, etc. but really the important player here is that special note. it's nice to learn how to use that note when the melody is in the 1,2,3,4 area

6.10.17  2:14 am   yo bill why you don't answer any more questions related to music theory?

     i do, but i respect your opinion

6.9.17  10:34 pm   I am telling a lie

     me too
6.9.17  10:31 pm   What's your opinion on opinions?

6.9.17  10:10 pm   I happen to think that the HTML on your website is extremely functional. Was that your intention?

     oh hell yeah

6.9.17  8:48 pm   how confident are you feeling about the next song being done by tuesday?

     today and yesterday were a nightmare. i didn't think it was possible. but somehow i pulled through and it is pretty much done, just making tiny adjustments
6.9.17  8:16 pm   can the buy all button actually lead to a zip file containing all of your songs and jingles? (it's a lot more convenient than downloading each of them 1 by 1)

6.9.17  7:49 pm   why were you so stressed in 2011?

     i remember 2011 as a mostly relaxing and stress-free year, full of learning and development

6.9.17  7:43 pm   Will you only make songs from now on?

     no but i will be doing a lot of them now

6.9.17  6:47 pm   You've become more shielded answering these over time (or more bored? cause I guess it gets monotonous) Would you say this is correct

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

6.9.17  6:42 pm   Will the short style videos (like the monday videos used to be) ever make a return?

     i no longer have a reason to keep things under 10 seconds, but i would consider doing the monday format again

6.9.17  5:51 pm   You said you liked the prospect of making tutorials on how you create... do you have any plans to do them?

     yes!

6.9.17  5:30 pm   Is this the only way that fans can communicate with you?

     also email

6.9.17  5:17 pm   When will you release a new video?

     when you least expect

6.9.17  5:08 pm   Why are you against making money?

     i am not. sorry for the misunderstanding

     Like not putting ads on YouTube

     ads on videos is a drag on the viewing experience, which in turn decreases the views

      and rejecting TV offers.

     most offers i receive would be a detriment to my career because they would tie up huge amounts of time doing a project that would not be the right project for me at that time. most offers ask me to basically re-trace previous steps in my career, except with more restrictions. not a good move

      One cannot survive on morals

     morals has nothing to do with it

6.9.17  4:50 pm   How does one purchase a canoe?

     step 1 find someone who is selling a canoe. step 2 give them the money. don't forget to take the canoe

6.9.17  4:03 pm   hi bill, i don't mean to be rude or anything but haven't you thought of having a... well, normal life?

     no

     it seems to me like you do nothing but work on videos and songs. don't you want to try out new things outside of just that?

     oh hell yeah

      i don't know...i was just wondering if you really want to do this.

     i'm just getting started. there are a lot of exciting twists and turns ahead

6.9.17  2:48 pm   Hey, really important question: do you prefer dark or white chocolate???

     dark

6.9.17  2:30 pm   When are you going to make a video?

     when you least expect

6.9.17  1:52 pm   do you compose songs from beginning to end? have you ever done it the other way around?

     it seems to be much easier to write songs forwards. sometimes if the chorus is written first, i might have to write a verse which leads into it, but that is always extremely challenging and i have no guaranteed way of doing it, i just have to keep asking questions and trying stuff until i find it

6.9.17  12:58 pm   Hey, I keep getting an arpeggio and an archipelago mixed up, what's the best way to remember the difference? Thank you

     an archipelago is the one that contains the letter L, because it is made of Land

6.9.17  12:45 pm   Since your huge success, have you considered making a team or have some form of help from plebs? You should have them to make even more content of your own, just keep it secret. PLS I JUST WANT MORE STUFF FROM YOU ;_;

     i want to do that but i have no idea how i would go about doing it. it would be so different from the way i normally work. there are many complications, and i think it would put more pressure to make more money quicker
6.9.17  10:15 am   thoughts on capital letters

6.9.17  9:37 am   You do your content to gain something for yourself or for the sake of the viewers?

     i do it so that the ideas in my mind can be experienced by other people. i'm not sure if that answers your question

6.9.17  8:58 am   Bill, I already watched history of the entire world, i guess. One thing that you didn't mention was Ferdinand Magellan. Maybe after sometime after Columbus discovered "the indies" and "japan" (let's draw a line to see who gets which hal of the world). Anyway, after all that, he wanted ro find the "indies" and ended up here, in the Philippines. He got killed by Lapu-Lapu. Why not mention that? Also, the only time I saw you mentioning the Philippines is "we've got business" and America goes there. That's all I could think of. Your bideos are great! ♪~ ᕕ(ᐛ)ᕗ

6.9.17  8:52 am   If you will finish a song before Tuesday, do you release it, or do you start working on a new one and wait for Tuesday?

     in order for it to get to be released by tuesday it actually has to be done by saturday

6.9.17  7:58 am   Hi bill! I really like your content, but please fix the HTML on your site, it's beyond broken! Or is that intentional?

     it seems to work fine, but i respect your opinion

6.9.17  6:29 am   is spotify profitable enough for you?

     i guess i'll have to start putting new songs there on a regular basis, and find out

6.9.17  6:14 am   i thought george clooney did your videos

     no he only does the music just kidding i do it

6.9.17  5:15 am   Are you sad on Mar 16, 2014

     no

6.9.17  3:17 am   why dont you make more videos?

     i've been making videos not stop since 2014. probably hundreds of videos. how about something a little different

6.9.17  3:08 am   what is your favorite country in the world. is it japan? i have a feeling its japan since you made a video about it. or is it not japan? what is it?

     i like the unique qualities of each one
6.9.17  1:41 am   fuck you
6.9.17  1:20 am   ew new york

6.9.17  12:39 am   Why aren't you posting your new songs on YouTube?

     i'm considering it, but i'm not sure if that's the best use of my youtube channel

6.9.17  12:20 am   I make music but other people make music that more people like. Should I try to be like the other musicians?

     you have to try to make music that You like. that's the only way anything is gonna make sense

6.9.17  12:07 am   how is consciousness attached to the brain? just some good ol' metaphysical glue?

     the consciousness is not an object. it's the patterns

6.8.17  11:39 pm   Some of your answers are very snarky, why even answer questions if you are either rude or not serious 90% of the time (of what I've read)?

     ah, i see your point. i will stop
